trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange> event occurs when a smart tag panel is displayed or hidden.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange>事件发生时的智能标记面板是显示还是隐藏。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange>

trans-unit.source: This event is not generated directly by the panel but rather by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService> class when its <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> methods are executed.
trans-unit.target: 此事件不会生成直接由面板但而是通过<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService>类时其<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A>和<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A>执行方法。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs"></xref> class.

For the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged> event, the `relatedObject` parameter always references the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component?displayProperty=fullName> that the panel is associated with.
trans-unit.target: 有关<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>事件，`relatedObject`参数始终引用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Component?displayProperty=fullName>面板相关联。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionService.DesignerActionListsChanged>

trans-unit.source: The object that is associated with the panel.
A value that specifies whether the panel is being displayed or hidden.
trans-unit.target: 一个值，指定面板是否正处于显示或隐藏。

trans-unit.source: Gets a flag indicating whether the smart tag panel is being displayed or hidden.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个标志，指示的智能标记面板是否正在显示或隐藏。

trans-unit.source: If the panel is being hidden through a call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A> method, this property has a value of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果通过调用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A>方法，此属性的值为<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType></xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.HideUI%2A>隐藏面板

trans-unit.source: If the panel is being shown through a call to <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A>, this property has a value of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果通过调用<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A>，此属性具有值为<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType></xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.ShowUI%2A>当前显示的面板

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeType"></xref> that indicates the state of the panel.
Gets the object that is associated with the smart tag panel.
trans-unit.target: 获取的智能标记面板与关联的对象。

trans-unit.source: The RelatedObject property enables the programmer to associate an object to an instance of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: RelatedObject 属性是使程序员能够将相关联的<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs>类</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIStateChangeEventArgs>实例的对象

trans-unit.source: This object then is available to methods that handle the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange> event.
trans-unit.target: 此对象然后可供处理的方法<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange>事件。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionUIService.DesignerActionUIStateChange>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> associated with the smart tag panel.
